languages.text: {n}В воксе слышен нарочито явный зевок.{/n} "Если твои корабельные орудия такие же слабые, как твои угрозы, то ты уже покойни{mf|к|ца}. Ладно, что терять время? Покажи, чего ты стоишь".
{n}The vox lets out a theatrical yawn.{/n} "If your ship's weapons are as weak as your threats, then you are already dead. Well, let's not waste any more time, shall we? Show me what you are worth!"
languages.original_text: {n}В воксе слышен нарочито явный зевок.{/n} "Если твои корабельные орудия такие же слабые, как твои угрозы, то ты уже покойни{mf|к|ца}. Ладно, что терять время? Покажи, чего ты стоишь".

{n}The vox lets out a theatrical yawn.{/n} "If your ship's weapons are as weak as your threats, then you are already dead. Well, let's not waste any more time, shall we? Show me what you are worth!"
{n}The vox lets out a theatrical yawn.{/n} "If your ship's weapons are as weak as your threats, then you are already dead. Well, let's not waste any more time, shall we? Show me what you are worth!"

languages.text: {n}El voco transmite un bostezo teatral.{/n} «Si las armas de tu nave son tan endebles como tus amenazas, estás muert{mf|o|a}. Bueno, no perdamos más el tiempo. ¡Demuéstrame de qué estás hech{mf|o|a}!».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox lets out a theatrical yawn.{/n} "If your ship's weapons are as weak as your threats, then you are already dead. Well, let's not waste any more time, shall we? Show me what you are worth!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco transmite un bostezo teatral.{/n} «Si las armas de tu nave son tan endebles como tus amenazas, estás muert{mf|o|a}. Bueno, no perdamos más el tiempo. ¡Demuéstrame de qué estás hech{mf|o|a}!».

languages.text: {n}音阵装置里传来了戏剧性的呵欠声。{/n}“如果你船上的武器就像你的威胁一样软弱无力，那你恐怕已经是个死人了。还是别浪费时间了，行吗？让我看看你到底有什么能耐！”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox lets out a theatrical yawn.{/n} "If your ship's weapons are as weak as your threats, then you are already dead. Well, let's not waste any more time, shall we? Show me what you are worth!"

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置里传来了戏剧性的呵欠声。{/n}“如果你船上的武器就像你的威胁一样软弱无力，那你恐怕已经是个死人了。还是别浪费时间了，行吗？让我看看你到底有什么能耐！”

languages.text: {n}Un bâillement théâtral s'élève du vox.{/n} « Si votre arsenal est aussi médiocre que vos menaces, vous venez de signer votre arrêt de mort. Enfin, inutile de perdre du temps en bavardage, n'est-ce pas ? Montrez-moi plutôt ce que vous avez dans le ventre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox lets out a theatrical yawn.{/n} "If your ship's weapons are as weak as your threats, then you are already dead. Well, let's not waste any more time, shall we? Show me what you are worth!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un bâillement théâtral s'élève du vox.{/n} « Si votre arsenal est aussi médiocre que vos menaces, vous venez de signer votre arrêt de mort. Enfin, inutile de perdre du temps en bavardage, n'est-ce pas ? Montrez-moi plutôt ce que vous avez dans le ventre ! »

languages.text: {n}ヴォックスから芝居がかったあくびが漏れる。{/n}「もしお前の船の武器がその脅しと同じくらい弱いなら、もうお前は死んでいる。さて、もう時間の無駄はやめようか？お前の実力を見せてみろ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox lets out a theatrical yawn.{/n} "If your ship's weapons are as weak as your threats, then you are already dead. Well, let's not waste any more time, shall we? Show me what you are worth!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォックスから芝居がかったあくびが漏れる。{/n}「もしお前の船の武器がその脅しと同じくらい弱いなら、もうお前は死んでいる。さて、もう時間の無駄はやめようか？お前の実力を見せてみろ！」

languages.text: {n}Vokstan teatral bir esneme duyuluyor.{/n} "Geminin silahları da tehditlerin kadar zayıfsa o zaman ayvayı yedin. Neyse, zaman kaybetmeden o ayvanın sapını da sana yedirmeli. Göster bakalım gücünü!"
languages.original_text: {n}The vox lets out a theatrical yawn.{/n} "If your ship's weapons are as weak as your threats, then you are already dead. Well, let's not waste any more time, shall we? Show me what you are worth!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vokstan teatral bir esneme duyuluyor.{/n} "Geminin silahları da tehditlerin kadar zayıfsa o zaman ayvayı yedin. Neyse, zaman kaybetmeden o ayvanın sapını da sana yedirmeli. Göster bakalım gücünü!"

languages.text: {n}Aus dem Vox ertönt ein theatralisches Gähnen.{/n} "Wenn die Waffen Eures Schiffs so schwach sind wie Eure Drohungen, seid Ihr schon tot. Dann lasst uns keine Zeit mehr verlieren, oder? Zeigt mir, was Ihr wert seid."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox lets out a theatrical yawn.{/n} "If your ship's weapons are as weak as your threats, then you are already dead. Well, let's not waste any more time, shall we? Show me what you are worth!"
